3. Juan J. Dolado - Professor of Economics at the University of Valencia and Research Director at the Institute for Economic Analysis (IAE-CSIC).

8. Luis M. Abadía - Professor of Economics at the University of Navarra and Research Fellow at CEPR.
9. Juan Carlos Conesa - Professor of Economics at the University of Barcelona and Research Associate at NBER.
10. Xavier Vives - Professor of Economics at IESE Business School in Barcelona.
